Key Match Events: Harry Brook and Liam Livingstone shared 78 runs
Jos Buttler claims superb catch and run out
Aiden Markram takes a fantastic catch over his shoulder to dismiss Harry Brook
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler: 'I'd say it was lost in the powerplay. Quinton de Kock came out and played with really good intent and we couldn't really match that.'
Aiden Markram: 'Getting to those last three overs and it looks like the odds are against you, to hang in there and get the win shows a lot of skill, but it comes from a lot deeper than that.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa beat England by seven runs to close on semi-finals
South Africa captain Aiden Markram: 'We are getting closer to the complete game. We are not there yet but we are on the right track.'
England still hold second spot but West Indies could still take them on net run-rate if they win their final two games, and England don't beat USA by a huge margin.
